Pickering, North Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £7, 3rd £3. March contest - 1st(£1.1s) Scarborough Rifles, 2nd Castle Howard. Promoted by Pickering Agricultural Society. 4 bands competed.
June 19, 2013, 9:22 a.m. July 26, 2016, 1:04 p.m.
